definition: mutually related, either of two or more related or complementary variables, to bring into a mutual, complementary, or reciprocal relation
details:
adjective
- mutually related
= synonyms: correlated, correlative
noun
- either of two or more related or complementary variables
= synonyms: correlative
verb
- to bring into a mutual, complementary, or reciprocal relation
= example: to bring into a mutual, complementary, or reciprocal relation
- to bear a reciprocal or mutual relation
= example: to bear a reciprocal or mutual relation
